definition: lit. tread the green; go for a walk in the spring (when the grass has turned green)/spring hike season around Qingming festival 清明, 4th-6th April
see 踏實|踏实[ta1 shi5]
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
green/blue/black/youth/young (of people)
to enjoy a beautiful spring walk (idiom)
to enjoy the flowers on a spring outing (idiom)

sentences.english: Cold food observance ban fire cold food festival tomb sweeping outing travel, take new fire.
sentences.chinese: 寒食禁火冷食祭墓，清明取新火踏青出遊。

sentences.english: Where shall we go for outing?
My footsteps overlap yours when we go for a walk in the country in spring.
sentences.chinese: 到郊外去踏青，重疊了你的足跡。

sentences.english: This is heavy overcast weather we have a go Ta-Qing Chihu.
sentences.chinese: 這是天氣陰沉沉的，我們有一個去踏青慈湖。

sentences.english: I don't think you can come here before that.
sentences.chinese: 我們去你那裏春遊踏青好不好？

sentences.english: The last day of New Year, the whole family Ta-Qing to avoid evil.
sentences.chinese: 新年最後一天，全家出遊踏青，以避邪惡。

sentences.english: Welcome you who share the same hobbies to join us!
sentences.chinese: 歡迎喜好攝影和踏青旅遊的單身朋友一起出遊。

definition: to go for a hike in spring
to enjoy the flowers on a spring outing (idiom)
to enjoy a beautiful spring walk (idiom)
to go for an outing/to go on an excursion
spring outing/spring excursion
autumn outing/autumn excursion
lovely spring sunshine
to go for a trip in spring
outing in the country/to go on a hike/to go courting
excursion/hike/march
clear and refreshing autumn weather
to enjoy the sights (of)
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to search for ancient relics
to cook a meal over a campfire (usu. for a group of people on an outing)/cookout
to be away for the summer holidays/to spend a holiday at a summer resort/to prevent sunstroke
